page.title: 06AGRICULTURAL CONTRACTORS
page.content: Ridgways rent{agricultural machinery to{farmers}who need them but can not afford to buy their own machinery. Machinery kept for hire;9{tractors, {2 J.C.B's,3 combines,3 grassmowers, {2 ploughs,2 corndrills,3 balers,8 {trailers,1 bulldozer,1 winch,1 snow {plough,1 draining machine,1 sprayer, {1 post knocker,1 potato planter,5 {forage harvesters and 1 vacuum tank. January & February are quiet with{snow {plouging,manuring & ditching.}March & April{sowing springcorn & peas.}May & June;{crop-spraying & silage cutting. July,August & September,{haymaking,2nd {cut silage and harvesting.}October, {ploughing.}November & December;{snow {clearance and ploughing.}Ridgways work over a ten mile radius and employ 6 {workers.}A{combine harvester}costs Â£43000 and a tractor Â£12000.They look at new machines at the Royal Show.
